item.title: [FLINK-18073] AvroRowDataSerializationSchema is not always serializable
item.description:
AvroRowDeserializationSchema member runtimeConverter may hold a reference to non serializable avro schema fields. This value should be transient and generated inside of open.

comments.comment: I did a cursory search of the serialization schema and I believe the same change will need to be made there.
Update, I can confirm the issue also exists in the serialization schema.

Hi sjwiesman, what do you mean "the issue also exists in the serialization schema"? I guess the title and description already mentioned this issue is about avro serialization schema. Do you mean it also exists in deserialization schema or AvroRowSerializationSchema?
jark Yes, I meant AvroRowDeserializationSchema. Thank you for catching that.

sjwiesman, do you mean AvroRowDataDeserializationSchema? The AvroRowDeserializationSchema is the legacy format implementation.

Btw, AvroRowDataDeserializationSchema works well in my added IT case in the PR.
jark You are correct, I stumbled on this and FLINK-18075 at the same time. I confused them in my head. Aplogies for the misunderstanding.
